Suggested rewording:
A regular expression that specifies topics to exclude from replica movements in optimization proposals calculated by Cruise Control. excludedTopics is parsed by the java.util.regex.Pattern class; for more information on the supported regex format, see the documentation for that class.

nodes.bodyText:
I think we should avoid the lengthy resource strings. Suggested rewording:
excludedTopics | If you specified a regular expression in the spec.excludedTopicsRegex property in the KafkaRebalance resource, all topic names matching the regex are listed. These topics are excluded from the calculation of partition replica movements in the optimization proposal.
